sourcesContent:
import { Button, TextField } from "@mui/material" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { addUser, setCurrentUser } from "../redux/Actions" import { useNavigate } from "react-router" import { InputWithValidate } from "./inputs/InputWithValidate" import { useState } from "react" import { InputIdentity } from "./inputs/InputIdentity" import { InputPassword } from "./inputs/InputPassword" import { InputPhone } from "./inputs/InputPhone" import { phoneClear } from "../Functions/PhoneClean" import LoginIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Login'; export const Register = () => { let users = useSelector(x => x.Users) let dis = useDispatch() let nav = useNavigate() const [identityErrorMessege, setIdentityErrorMessege] = useState() let creditNumberCondition = [{ func: (value) => !/^\d{16}$/.test(value), messege: "invalid credit number" }] let validitiCondition = [{ func: (value) => !/^((0[1-9])|(1[0-2]))-\d{2}$/.test(value), messege: "invalid validiti" }] let cvvCondition = [{ func: (value) => !/^\d{3}$/.test(value), messege: "invalid cvv" }] const login = (e) => { e.preventDefault() for (let i = 0; i < e.target.length - 2; i += 2) { e.target[i].blur() if (document.getElementById(e.target[i].id + "-helper-text")) return } for (let i = 0; i < users.length; i++) if (users[i].tz == e.target[0].value) { setIdentityErrorMessege("identity number exists") return } let user = { id: (users.length + 1) * 100, name: e.target[2].value, tz: e.target[0].value, phone: phoneClear(e.target[6].value), password: e.target[4].value, CreditNumber: e.target[8].value, validity: e.target[10].value, cvv: e.target[12].value, userTypeId: 2 } dis(addUser(user)) dis(setCurrentUser(user)) nav("/UserZone") } return <>
login(e)}>
}
